general.name: CIS Benchmark Enforcement | Passcode
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>F04EDCFA-2331-4A75-B4CA-4EBE7C440C3D</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Parachute Test</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>F04EDCFA-2331-4A75-B4CA-4EBE7C440C3D</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>CIS Benchmark Enforcement | Passcode</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadScope</key><string>System</string><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Passcode Payload</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>A0555069-C5AD-41CC-BCC7-45A2F865F4AB</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>JAMF Software</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.mobiledevice.passwordpolicy</string><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>A0555069-C5AD-41CC-BCC7-45A2F865F4AB</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>forcePIN</key><true/><key>maxFailedAttempts</key><integer>5</integer><key>maxPINAgeInDays</key><integer>365</integer><key>minLength</key><integer>15</integer><key>pinHistory</key><integer>15</integer></dict></array></dict></plist>
